data.text: @alice_sk_du The rebooking fee will be waived as long as you are fit for the special ticketing arrangement. However, please understand that it is subject to fare difference.  You may check here for more details: https://t.co/CflKpDUZf0 Thank you! - Liz

@Djbillycaldwell Hi there, we are sorry that no waiver apply for cancellation at the moment :( You may rebook your flight free of charge. For more details, you may refer to https://t.co/CflKpDUZf0 Thanks for your understanding! - Liz
@MarcoFettolini We are sorry about that! May you share your eTicket number and passenger name through DM  for checking please?- Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@MarcoFettolini We are sorry about that! May you share your eTicket number and passenger name through DM  for checking please?- Liz
@annesugaa Hi there, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Mehdiiii_ As your ticket is booked through a third party, we are unable to amend/cancel, please approach your travel agent for follow-up. Thank you for your understanding - Holly 2/2

@Mehdiiii_ Hi there, rebooking, rerouting and refund charges will be waived for all confirmed bookings arriving to or departing from the Philippines between 4 February 2020 and 30 April 2020. More details can be found here https://t.co/YcZPA2jRIK - Holly 1/2

data.text: @carlo_pamintuan Hi there, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Komiks13 Sure! - Chloe
@Komiks13 Hi there, it will not be a problem. But please let us know the dimension of your bike in advance, we will have to make a sport request for you :) -Elsa
@JazzTehara Hi there. There is no problem for transit in Hong Kong. - Anna
@Pedanticus1 Hi there, as team received a large volume of refund request, it may take longer time as usual. It would take up to 6-8 weeks for the process. We appreciate your patience. -Ella
@Josellibee Hi Joselle, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? -Joy https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Rajibali28 Hi Rajib, we can only see that the booking is cancelled. Please check with the travel agent directly for the refund status and process. Thank you.

@Ruth_Hochberg Cancellation fee is according to the ticket's fare rules. If you purchased with us directly, you may cancel the booking before departure date at Manage Booking https://t.co/v0jA1LMcct
If you booked with a travel agency, please check with them directly for the refund policy. -Joy
@RajChaudhuri1 Thanks for the support, Raj! We're glad you're onboard with us during these times, and we look forward to seeing you inflight in the future. - Devin
@WalkerEcon Hi Jack, would you mind to DM us your booking reference, so that we can have a look -Elsa
@Rajibali28 Hi there. Sorry to keep you waiting since we are now handling high volume of messages. We note that booking is cancelled. Thank you for your patience and understanding. - Anna

@Ruth_Hochberg Hi there. There is no cancellation waiver for the flights in APR. Since situation is changed from time to time, we keep monitoring and you are advised to keep an eye on our website at https://t.co/c1bvvRZjJx Thank you. - Anna
@MaestraHamdaoui Hi there, sorry for the flight change. Can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Fundamentallly Hi there. Mind provide more details through DM and we can provide further assist? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@phitweee Hi there, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@riley_globetrtr Hi Riley, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@yjlu Hi there, we are sorry to hear that :(  Can you provide us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name through DM so we can check on this for you to see if you can rebook your trip?- Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@revitalize1991 Hi Eka, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@SummerJS Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@pstebbings Hi there. Exemption is provided for passengers transiting through Hong Kong. - Anna
@mamamia852 Hi there. Mind providing us the eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@lauraazcona We're sorry about that. Can you please share your eTicket no and full name in DM so we can further assist? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@awcthk Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@DDebKol After checking in the transaction record, the refund has been processed on 20 Feb. Can you please check with your bank? - Chloe
@Ramonido Refund process will take longer than usual as there is a high volume of refund requests recently. Thank you for remaining patient - Chloe
@lovloothra @makemytrip @AirCanada @makemytripcare Hi there, Can you provide us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name through DM so we can check on this for you?- Liz

-Joy

data.text: @ravcho4 Hi there, we are sorry about that ! May you please share your eTicket number, baggage tag number, passenger full name and email contact through DM so we can pass it to our baggage team to follow up please? Thank you! - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Johnayr67475067 We are sorry to hear your disappointment! May you share your eTicket number and passenger name through DM to us so we can follow up for you? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@TheCaitfish We are sorry to hear that! May I know if you have requested for the special meal 24 hours before your scheduled flight but our staff are unable to provide it for you? @RyoYokoe1 Hi there. We replied in DM. Thank you. - Anna

@KHDang88 Hi there. We will honour the highest class of travel (First Class) for lounge entitlement. But please note that this only applies to flights operated by Cathay Pacific and Cathay Dragon. For your information, the opening hour is until last departure. - Anna
@dzehtsiarou Hi there. We are sorry about that. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@devarshiajoshi Hi there. Sorry to keep you waiting since we are now handling high volume of messages. We replied in your DM. Thanks for your understanding.  - Anna

@AdamWielo @AsiaMiles Hi there. Sorry to keep you waiting as team is now handling high volume of calls. Mind providing us your eTicket number, full name and contact number with country code through DM please? so we can ask team to contact you. Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
